text:
Gentle reminder for #cannabis researchers

Call for abstracts for CMC #CannabinoidResearch Conference for oral presentations within the themes of #Pain, #Epilepsy, #Cancer, #MentalHealth #Psychiatry, #Neurodegeneration and #RealWorldEvidence.
Deadline 29/2
https://t.co/AWFAcvt5aI https://t.co/EfMdnUDiBh
